experience: You and Paula both know Tim Mortimer, Stephen "Oz" Oslund, and 43 others

We are a unique collection of creative, award winning professionals,  who direct and produce a wide range of TV commercials, corporate films, digital  and documentaries. We partner with the best directors in the country on a project-by-project basis to create the perfect team for each assignment. We are proud of our  successful seventeen years and our strong partnerships with top ad agencies.
Senior Producer and Business Manager for busy National film production company.

recommendations: Tasha Oldham
Filmmaker, Commercial Director, Video Marketing, Web Video Producer and Storyteller
August 1, 2016, Tasha reported directly to Paula

Paula is a top notch producer. I had the sincere honor to collaborate with her on a series of spot for University of Arizona Medical Center. She was everything a director hopes for in a producer, supportive, encouraging, strong, creative and her team and clients LOVE her. I was traveling so you never know what team you'll get, her team treated me and my DP like we were part of the family. That is the type of people Paula attracts, top notch professionals who are also genuinely good people who love what they do. She was a wonderful liaison between me, the agency and the client. I was hugely impressed and can't wait to work with her again soon.
Tasha Oldham

Executive Producer,  Cosmic Pictures Inc
July 1, 2013, Linda was a client of Paula’s

I have had the pleasure of partnering with Paula Merrill and her production company on many occasions.  In addition to bringing deep production experience, good value, and creativity, she also brings world-class directors to the table.  That makes me look pretty heroic - I can bring in a project on time and on budget with directorial talent who would otherwise not be affordable.  Additionally, Paula is honest and fun to work with.  I'm fortunate to have her as a resource and a friend.

Matt Pittroff
DIRECTOR @ STATION FILM
February 26, 2010, Paula worked with Matt in the same group

WOW. I am not sure where to start.  Paula is a very rare find in this business.  She is loved by all, respected by all, and without tooting my own horn---she has a great eye for talent.  From her humble perch in Phoenix she tracks down and nurtures developing talent---at least she did with me.  She found me about 5 years ago and stuck with me thru the wins and the losses.  She is smart, sophisticated and incredibly calming.  Don't let her fool ya---Paula knows her shit---and while she may not know how to force quit her computer she knows what's important in this business and life---relationships, loyalty, and smart hard work.  I hope Paula and I have many years ahead as partners.
Matt Pittroff
DIRECTOR @ STATION FILM

I had the privilege of working with Carlos on some wonderfully,  challenging cross-cultural TV commercials. As an Art Director he was a bundle of creativity. He brought to each job visual integrity and valuable insight into how to visually insure the culture was authentic and included. Carlos was an important participant in these productions and brought great value to the client and success to the agency and production company.

We have had challenging talent searches before in Phoenix, so we were delighted that Faith was able to bring in a large group of well qualified talent for us to choose from.
